name: telegram-webapp-cloudflare-template
description: Telegram Web App + Bot Template for Cloudflare

scripts.install: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.stop: pkill -f 'wrangler dev.*8787' || true; pkill -f 'vite' || true; pkill -f 'workerd' || true; echo 'Dev servers stopped'
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'No lint script found'
scripts.lint:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint || echo 'No lint script found'
scripts.clean-check: npm run clean && npm run install && npm run build && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.db:migrate:local: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply telefare_prod_db --local

author: Your Name
